item.title: Comment on Error-prone facial recognition leads to another wrongful arrest by William
item.dc:creator: William
item.description: Terrible that this seems to be an emerging pattern, but people have to understand that this is a new & growing field, and there will be mishaps. GET IT STRAIGHT! then deploy.
item.content:encoded: Terrible that this seems to be an emerging pattern, but people have to understand that this is a new & growing field, and there will be mishaps. GET IT STRAIGHT! then deploy.

item.title: Comment on US and EU agree to collaborate on improving lives with AI by Don
item.dc:creator: Don
item.description:
In order to improve the quality of human lives there are many data elements and modeling parameters that need to be considered.
1. The "Quality of Life" AI model must include every reasonable example of High Universal Values. E.G., self & mutual respect, kindness, compassion, charity, gratitude, etc... The AI having high universal values as its default position models the human genetic disposition for homeostasis. Homeostasis equating to high universal values.
2. The AI must include continuously updated models of human microbiology, E.G., cellular, biochemistry, epigenetics, neuroplasticity, synaptic pruning, etc..., among other fields related to the involuntary imprinting, updating, and expression of thoughts, emotions, behavior, dialogue, and perceptions.
2. The AI must also be able to readily detect and identify adversarial, dysfunctional, and undesirable patterns of thought by observing behavior, emotions, dialogue, which offer insight into the perceptions of individuals and their environment conditions.
3. The AI's learning models should include all current and historical data sets containing adversarial, dysfunctional, and undesirable patterns of human behavior in corporate, political, religious, and social ideologies.
4. The AI should have an understanding of our three primary environments. The mind, physical, and social.
Etc...
I would love to assistance in this project or something similar. Please feel free to contact me at dkieffer@heretoevolve.com
Thank you for the article, the legislation, and let's hope some of the above is included in the AI model.
Best regards.
item.content:encoded:
In order to improve the quality of human lives there are many data elements and modeling parameters that need to be considered.

1. The “Quality of Life” AI model must include every reasonable example of High Universal Values. E.G., self & mutual respect, kindness, compassion, charity, gratitude, etc… The AI having high universal values as its default position models the human genetic disposition for homeostasis. Homeostasis equating to high universal values.

2. The AI must include continuously updated models of human microbiology, E.G., cellular, biochemistry, epigenetics, neuroplasticity, synaptic pruning, etc…, among other fields related to the involuntary imprinting, updating, and expression of thoughts, emotions, behavior, dialogue, and perceptions.

2. The AI must also be able to readily detect and identify adversarial, dysfunctional, and undesirable patterns of thought by observing behavior, emotions, dialogue, which offer insight into the perceptions of individuals and their environment conditions.

3. The AI’s learning models should include all current and historical data sets containing adversarial, dysfunctional, and undesirable patterns of human behavior in corporate, political, religious, and social ideologies.

4. The AI should have an understanding of our three primary environments. The mind, physical, and social.

Etc…

I would love to assistance in this project or something similar. Please feel free to contact me at dkieffer@heretoevolve.com

Thank you for the article, the legislation, and let’s hope
some of the above is included in the AI model.

Best regards.

item.title: Comment on Clearview AI has been found to have extensive far-right ties by yurii
item.dc:creator: yurii
item.description: "praising the ethnonationalism of Putin’s Russia" Lol, Putin's Russia is the second in the world by number of migrants, there's about 2 million musilms in Moscow alone and far right parties and movements are almost completely banned.
item.content:encoded: “praising the ethnonationalism of Putin’s Russia” Lol, Putin’s Russia is the second in the world by number of migrants, there’s about 2 million musilms in Moscow alone and far right parties and movements are almost completely banned.
